import React from 'react' import SubmitButton from '../../../Components/UI/Button/Button' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import './AdminDetailForm.css' import * as actionCreators from "../../../Service/Action/action"; import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' const AdminDetailForm = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {loading,userdetail} = useSelector(state => state.userdetails) const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, reset } = useForm({ mode: "onTouched", defaultValues:{ fullname:userdetail.profile.fullname, email:userdetail.profile.email, mobilenumber:userdetail.profile }, }); const onSubmit = (data, e) => { e.preventDefault(); const myForm = new FormData(); myForm.set("name", data.fullname); myForm.set("email", data.email); myForm.set("phone", data.mobilenumber); myForm.set("qualification", data.qualification); myForm.set("profile", props.profileImage); dispatch(actionCreators.addAdminDetails(myForm)) reset(); } const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); props.setTrigger(false); } return (props.trigger) ? (

Fill Personal Details

{errors.fullname?.message}

{errors.email?.message}

{errors.mobilenumber?.message}

{errors.qualification?.message}

) : null; } export default AdminDetailForm
